snippet.title: Tommy Gun Witches Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
A whodunit, with witches?! In Tommy Gun Witches, you play as a sentinel, a detective who investigates crimes committed by witches, gremlins, devils, you get the picture.

Get the game on Itch: https://cosmicvoid.itch.io/tommy-gun-witches

Tommy Gun Witches is a short point and click adventure by Cosmic Void that incorporates elements of narrative fiction, walking simulator, and visual novel genres. The focus is on character interactions, dialogues, exploration, with  puzzles used mainly to support the narrative and punctuate the pacing. A retro adventure with pixel-art graphics, what more is there to want, really?

Music by Eric Matyas: 
https://soundimage.org/
